about_the_game:
One night, all GEOF members were called upon an urgent mission, an urban gang has grown strong in these past weeks and had managed to avoid the spotlight until recently.
Gather your squad, customize its equipment, choose your resources, dive into Mafia-controlled buildings, and fight through hordes of enemies to protect your city!



FEATURES:

  • Customize your 5 squad member’s equipment to suit your strategy.



  • Fight through several rooms using covers to position yourself with advantage and flank the enemy.



  • Plan your strategy for each room in a preparation phase where you expend your resources and get ready to raid!

content_descriptors.notes: You use weapons to kill your enemies.

short_description: The City of Fury is a SWAT-like team management RTS set in a dystopian Cyberpunk-Noir setting, where you play as the team leader who gets involved in shady matters. Explore the themes of violence as you face the harsh city with your team to ultimately break free from the circle!
